NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Red Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team. Simon Cowell has told Oprah Winfrey the secrets of his success and his fear of failure. "Doing these shows is relentless," he said. When the ratings come in you're happy for five minutes, then insecure madness comes in, and you worry about next week.
